Jonathan Tsang

I'm a student at the University of Waterloo and I want to think outside the box.

Who I Am

I had an unconventional path to CS. Even though I never pursued CS in highschool, I found a passion for writing code and solving problems in my own spare time. I decided to transfer into Computer Science after loving coding.

Projects

Check out my projects here

PocketMonitor



Chrome Extension that makes an iframe at the top of Youtube pages that scales to the size of the browser window.

Top Down Shooter



Top down shooter using your mouse to aim and spacebar to shoot zombies with 6 weapons.

Ladder Jump



An array based game where you jump over bombs, rotate the array and unlock doors.

Mastermind



Command-line based game where it accepts input and the player must guess the randomized code.

AmiiboPlace



Super Smash Bros Melee focused news and analysis website averaging over 400 viewers a month.
